title: Neil Hudson – 2022 Comments on Penny Mordaunt Becoming Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Neil Hudson, the Conservative MP for Penrith and The Border, on Twitter on 21 October 2022.
content:
I am backing Penny Mordaunt to be Prime Minister as I believe she has the leadership attributes, experience, empathy and compassion to unite our country and lead us through these challenging times.
